ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 49
ygData.msgSnippet: the spell summon heatstone is in the game. I foget which server it was but I saw a magician giving them away to anyone that wanted one in freeport on saturday
ygData.messageBody:
the spell summon heatstone is in the game. I foget which server it was but I
saw a magician giving them away to anyone that wanted one in freeport on
saturday or sunday. If I ever see that magician again I will ask her about
the spell, but it seems like you do need a summon element scroll to make it.
----- Original Message -----
From: Jordan <jordanis@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 7:29 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Digest Number 49


> From: Jordan <jordanis@...>
>
> >
> > From: "Ben Humphreys" <benh@...>
> >Subject: Summon Element Scroll
> >
> >The level 16 Magician Spell, Summon Heatstone requires a component called
> >'Summon Element Scroll', does anyone know what this is? I'm thinking
maybe
> >it is any Summon Elemental (Pet) scroll.
>
> >Tremor of Bristlebain
>
> Well Tremor, I've ask that very same question to almost every magician on
Fennin Ro, including EVERY GM that i can get ahold of. The standard reply
is "Gee I don't know, i'll document it. Good luck!" Therefore i can only
assume that Verant has NO ONE actually verifying the text put into the game.
I do NOT think it's a pet scroll since most of them are used only for other
pets. This was probbably a spell that was never put into the final, and
since the Heatstone spell is able to be purchased, not many magicians have
complained. I'd do a "FEEDBACK" to let them know. I already have as well.
>
> Meraxes Glibilskym, Gnome Magician, Fennin Ro
>
>
> Jordan
> Jordanis@...
>
> My ICQ Number 2878828
>
